p.codeblock: [ { "id": 1, "name": "Hisako Ichiki", "heroName": "Armor", "power": "Psionic exoskeleton armor", "debut": "Astonishing X-Men #4 (2004)", "creator": "Joss Whedon, John Cassaday" }, { "id": 2, "name": "Anna Marie", "heroName": "Rogue", "power": "Power absorption through touch", "debut": "Avengers Annual #10 (1981)", "creator": "Chris Claremont, Michael Golden" }, { "id": 3, "name": "Jean Grey", "heroName": "Phoenix", "power": "Telepathy, telekinesis, Phoenix Force", "debut": "X-Men #1 (1963)", "creator": "Stan Lee, Jack Kirby" } ]
